Comments_List: My rotations with Dr. Spiegel and Levine were brilliant.
Learn how to do the experiment in the lab that I worked in.

Strengths: gives students the opportunity to experience the lab research and environment, also expose students to diverse research topics if they want.

Weaknesses: the duration of the rotation differs a lot.
It is better if we start our third rotation 1 week later.
